meanings: [명사] regret, [동사] regret, (formal) repent, be sorry (for), feel regret (for)

vlive.korean: 돌고래 당신의 생을 뒤돌아 봤을 때 후회가 남는 게 있나요? When you look back into your dolphin life, do you regret anything? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 전생 체험하다가 죽음을 경험한 로켓펀치 연희 #아이돌 #리얼리티 ┃로켓펀치 [펀치타임
vlive.english: When you look back into your dolphin life, do you regret anything?

vlive.korean: 후회 안 해? getting back at Jung Gyumin like that? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 마지막화) 5분 만에 전남친한테 최고의 복수하는 법 [엑스엑스(XX)] - EP.10
vlive.english: getting back at Jung Gyumin like that?

vlive.korean: 후회하게 만들겠어, 다신 그러지 못하게! I will make you regret it. So that you won't ever do such thing again! 듣기 View video iKON : 2월8일은 무슨날?
vlive.english: I will make you regret it. So that you won't ever do such thing again!

vlive.korean: 야식이라는 자체가 어쨌든 후회를 하게 돼있지 않나요? Don't you always feel regret after eating a late night snack? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 깜짝🦦
vlive.english: Don't you always feel regret after eating a late night snack?

vlive.korean: 러프하게 내일... - 이 말씀하신 거 후회하시는 거 아니에요? Let's do it tomorrow... - Aren't you going to regret what you said? 듣기 View video WINNER : 💥김송이💥
vlive.english: Let's do it tomorrow... - Aren't you going to regret what you said?

examples.korean: He seemed to feel no remorse at all. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 조금도 후회하지 않는 듯했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He seemed to feel no remorse at all. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She had repented of what she had done. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 자신이 한 일을 후회했었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She had repented of what she had done. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I deeply regret what I said. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 내가 한 말을 깊이 후회한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I deeply regret what I said. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: What is your greatest regret? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 가장 유감[후회]스러운 것이 무엇인가요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: What is your greatest regret? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You’ll be sorry if I catch you! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 널 붙잡게 되면 넌 후회할 거야! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You’ll be sorry if I catch you! Add to Wordbook
